title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 500.5 - Reimbursement and payment for appointments not kept
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 500.5 - Reimbursement and payment for appointments not kept

State Regulations

Reimbursement shall not be available to the local
districts nor shall payment be made through the Medicaid Management Information

System under the Medical Assistance Program for appointments for medical care
which are not kept. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
500.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
